com.google.template.soy.shared.restricted

Class EscapingConventions.FilterHtmlAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.escape.Escaper
      • com.google.template.soy.shared.restricted.EscapingConventions.CrossLanguageStringXform
        • com.google.template.soy.shared.restricted.EscapingConventions.FilterHtmlAttributes
  • Enclosing class:
    EscapingConventions

    public static final class EscapingConventions.FilterHtmlAttributes
extends EscapingConventions.CrossLanguageStringXform
    Implements the |filterHtmlAttributes directive which filters out identifiers that can't appear as part of an HTML tag or attribute name.
